title: Can we pray in a masjid in Europe built by France, or is it a masjid dirar?
transcript: sufyan from France there is a mosque in Europe that that France built to pay to pay homage to its mus Muslim soldiers who died in fighting with with it in World War one but we know that France was fighting against the oan oan empire so is this MOS like like a mid of and can you pray in it I believe that this is a Masjid and no matter what their intention for building it was what counts is if the Imam is upon the correct AA and the activities of the M of the Masjid are in line with Shar you can pray in that without any problem
